27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Mas'ud narrated that the Messenger of Allah said:"Verbally abusing the Muslim is disobedience and fighting him is disbelief." Zubaid said:"I said to Abu Wa'il: 'Did you hear it from 'Abdullah?' He said: 'Yes

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Verbally Abusing The Muslim Is Disobedience, And Fighting Him Is Disbelief
